name: Promise Of Elysium
description:
Promise of Elysium is a narrative focused point and click adventure game. The player is tasked with leading Arcadius Zika, a Spartan war general through a journey of life and death.

This was a fairly recent University project where we were tasked with making a "meaningful game", I chose to do this through narrative.

The production time from Pre- Production to Release was 10 Weeks.

Team Size: 1.

My role(s) on this project were: Design Lead, Art Lead, Programming Lead, along with all of the other hats I was required to wear when creating a solo project.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

Entirely Mouse Driven.

Left Click on the ground to move Arcadius.

Right Click brings up the radial menu for various actions.

Alt + F4 closes the application.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

It is recommended to launch the game through the Itch.io app for ease of use. 

If downloading manually navigate to the build file and run the .exe file to launch the game. 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
